  16. /* Private definitions shared by both Unix and Windows process runners */

  18. #ifndef __RUN_COMMON_H__
  19. ‌#define __RUN_COMMON_H__

  21. /* is_defined(str) returns 1 iff str points to a non-empty string */
  22. /* Otherwise returns 0 */
  23. ‌static int is_defined(const char_os *str)
  24. {
  25.   return (str != NULL) && (*str != 0);
  26. }

  28. ‌static void defaultLogger(void *where, const char *format, va_list ap)
  29. {
  30.   vfprintf(stderr, format, ap);
  31. }

  33. ‌static void mylog(Logger *logger, void *loggerData, char *fmt, ...)
  34. {
  35.   va_list ap;
  36.   va_start(ap, fmt);
  37.   logger(loggerData, fmt, ap);
  38.   va_end(ap);
  39. }

  41. ‌static void error_with_location(
  42.   const char *file, int line,
  43.   const command_settings *settings,
  44.   const char *msg, ...)
  45. {
  46.   va_list ap;
  47.   Logger *logger = (settings->logger != NULL) ? settings->logger
  48.                                               : defaultLogger;
  49.   void *loggerData = settings->loggerData;
  50.   va_start(ap, msg);
  51.   mylog(logger, loggerData, "%s:%d: ", file, line);
  52.   logger(loggerData, msg, ap);
  53.   mylog(logger, loggerData, "\n");
  54.   va_end(ap);
  55. }



  59. #endif /* __RUN_COMMON_H__ */
